name: Samantha Lambros

name: Kevin Tripp

text: If you have any kind of food allergy this is the place for you. I've tried every gluten pizza possible and theirs is Extraordinary.  Crispy, and light,  and their sauces and toppings are to die for. They were a Blessing  and their customer service was excellent.

text: Blaze Pizza has the best Keto pizza that I‚Äôve enjoyed eating to date. The Keto pizza has very few total/net carbs, and includes a delicious, crispy crust with zero carbs in the red sauce, which is quite good and flavorful. The Keto pizza ‚Ä¶More

text: Great food, poor service. I apparently offended the employees by not wearing a mask into a restaurant.

name: Lanada Cunningham

text: I love their pizza. And their root beer and brownies are great too. I can't give them 5 stars though, because of the atmosphere. Eating at this blaze is like eating in a parking garage. Always too cold, concrete and steel everywhere. Loud, ‚Ä¶More

text: My wife and I were pleasantly surprised.  The pizzas were filling and there were a large variety of options.  I went the vegan route, and they have vegan cheese and vegan chorizo.  They even offered to switch hooves to make mine.  The staff was very friendly.  I would recommend this to anyone who wants a quality pizza, fast.

name: Elston Flowers
text: For my first time, I was pleased with the place. I like watching them create my pizza and asking me what ingredients to add or leave out while I am there. I ordered a signature pizza, the Link In, and it was quite good. To drink, I had Stiegl Radler Grapefruit Beer.
